牼牼牼
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 牛, 巠, 瞷, 耕
Связанный персонаж (и): крупный рогатый скот, выпас, сидение на корточках, вспашка

牼字的基本解释

牼
kēng
牛胫骨。
古通“顅”，颈长。

牼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kēng］
［《廣韻》口莖切，平耕，溪。］
［《廣韻》户耕切，平耕，匣。］
即牛胫骨。牛膝下的骨头。

牼字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【牛字部】　牼； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页700第30
【廣韻】口莖切【集韻】【韻會】丘耕切，?音鏗。【說文】牛膝下骨也。　又人名。【春秋·襄十七年】邾子牼卒。【左傳·昭二十年】使少司?牼以歸。【孟子】宋牼將之楚。　又【廣韻】戸耕切【集韻】何耕切，?音莖，義同。【春秋·邾子牼釋文】徐音戸耕反。　又【集韻】丘閑切，音慳。又【集韻】古定切【類篇】吉定切，?音徑。義?同。

牼字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
牼字的起名意思

暂无。

shank bone of ox
Basic explanation of words
shank bone of ox
kēng
Cow shin.
Gutong has a long neck.
shank bone of ox
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kēng］
["Guangyun" Cut the mouth and stem, plow, and stream. ]
["Guangyun" household farming cut, flat farming, box. ]
That is, cattle tibia. The bones under the achyranthes.
shank bone of ox
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Bull Character Department] 　牼; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 700 No. 30
[Guang Yun] Mouth Stem Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Qiu Geng cut,? Yin Keng. [Said the text] The lower bones of the achyranthes.　Another name. [Spring and Autumn·Xiangsu Seventeenth Year] Su Zi died. [Zuo Zhuan·20 Years of Zhao] Make the young master? 【Mencius】Song Yan Jiang Zhi Chu.　[Guangyun] Gengqie [Jiyun] He Gengqie,? Sound stem, meaning the same. [Chun Qiu·Xu Zi Zhan's Interpretation] Xu Yindu's rebellion against farming.　[Jiyun] Qiu cuts leisurely and saves sound. And [Jiyun] Ancient Dingqie [Class Chapter] Ji Dingqie, the sound path. Righteous? Same.
